reqs:
Pre-reqs: THTR 356.
Priority will be given to BFA Design /Production and BA Theatre majors who have successfully completed the pre-requisite.
This is a WAITLIST section for THTR 456, Section 001. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
description: Pattern development and cutting for costume for stage and screen using flat pattern and draping.
